text: Roland Povinelli (9 August 1941 – 11 May 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the Senate of France from 2008 to 2014, representing the Bouches- du-Rhône department. He was Mayor of Allauch from 1975 until his death in 2020. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was born in Marseille, France. Povinelli died on 11 May 2020 of a heart attack in Allauch, France at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French mayors
title: Roland Povinelli
